entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Hearst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:33 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
